pinyin: guang3 er2 gao4 zhi1 guang3 gao4 gong1 si1

sentences.english: Please notify PTA immediately if you cannot perform the Parents on Duty due to schedule conflicts and any other problems.
sentences.chinese: 若預定值日時間無法當值，請立即告之家長會。

sentences.english: If you decide to take advantage of our offer, kindly cable your acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 如果貴方決定接受我方的報盤，請以電傳告之接受。

sentences.english: I’ll simply have to tell him the truth.
Three days later, the generals telephone divisions of speed to receive table.
sentences.chinese: 三日後，將軍電話告之，速來領表。

definition: to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
